import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { changeName, changeTag, initializeForm } from '../actions' import './App.css' const SelectOS = ({ store }) => { const { osName, osTag } = store.getState().form const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('/api/imgInfo', { osName, osTag, }) .then(response => { console.log(response) store.dispatch(initializeForm()) }) .catch(err => { console.error(new Error(err)) }) } return (
handleSubmit(e)}>



) } export default SelectOS
